verses.verse: [A psalme of Dauid.] The earth is Gods and all that therin is: the worlde, & they that dwell therin.
For he hath laide the foundation of it vpon the seas: and he hath set it sure vpon the fluddes.
Who shal ascende into the hyll of God? or who shall ryse vp in his holy place?
[Euen he that hath] cleane handes, and a pure heart: & that hath not taken his soule in vayne, nor sworne disceiptfully.
He shall receaue a blessyng from God: and ryghteousnesse from the Lorde of his saluation.
This is the generation of them that seke hym: euen of them that seke thy face [in] Iacob. Selah.
Lyft vp your heades O ye gates, and be ye lyft vp ye euerlastyng doores and the kyng of glorie shall enter in.
Who is this kyng of glorie? it is God both strong & mightie, it is God mightie in battayle.
Lyft vp your heades (O ye gates) and be you lyft vp ye euerlastyng doores: and the kyng of glorie shall enter in.
Who is this kyng of glorie? euen the God of hostes, he is the kyng of glorie. Selah.
